name: Leap Pong
description:
This is a just a prototype to show how the Leap Motion Controller can be used to play pong.

How to Play:

- Place both hands over the controller, palms flat.

- The paddle mimics the position and rotation of your hands.

- The ball will launch after 3 seconds.

- The game resets when you miss the ball.

Planned Features:

- Actual UI

- Player v/s AI, Player v/s Player modes

- More feedbacks and effects

- Sound
